last_episode_to_air.name: The Red Thread
last_episode_to_air.overview: Patri and Vero prepare to move into their new apartment and Ramiro resolves to move on. Álex and Bruno can't seem to break the red thread of destiny.

name: Smiley
overview: Álex has just suffered a love disappointment and sends a voice message to his boy friend in anger but the voice is received by Bruno. This mistake ends up making them meet and what begins as a date ends up having greater significance.

episodes.name: When Alex Met Bruno
episodes.overview: A misplaced voicemail connects hunky bartender Álex with Bruno, a movie-loving architect. Álex's friend Vero mulls over big next steps in her life.

episodes.name: Icarus's Wings
episodes.overview: Álex and Bruno's first date turns out to be a rollercoaster ride. Bruno's friends Albert and Núria meet with a potential new nanny before a night out.

episodes.name: Bringing Up Baby
episodes.overview: Bruno and Álex both wake up feeling confused about how to navigate the morning after. Albert struggles at work. Patri and Vero try to reconnect.

episodes.name: Begin the Beguine
episodes.overview: While Álex agonizes over texting Bruno back, Vero and Patri venture into the world of dating apps. Bruno's co-worker Ramón surprises him.

episodes.name: All Hearts Come Home for Christmas
episodes.overview: At three different celebrations, unexpected guests and revelations make for a memorable Christmas Day.

episodes.name: One Degree of Separation
episodes.overview: Álex and Bruno cross paths again. Javi offers Ramiro a sympathetic ear. Vero and Albert both experience moments of clarity.

episodes.name: Five Minutes Before the Countdown
episodes.overview: A rowdy New Year's Eve party at Bar Bero brings everyone together for a night full of songs, cava and — for better or worse — honest conversations.

episodes.name: The Red Thread
episodes.overview: Patri and Vero prepare to move into their new apartment and Ramiro resolves to move on. Álex and Bruno can't seem to break the red thread of destiny.
